# Consensus Problems

Distributed consensus and leader election protocols.

## Problems

| ID | Name | Description |
|----|------|-------------|
| cn001 | Leader Election | Basic leader election |
| cn002 | Bully Election | Bully algorithm |
| cn003 | Ring Election | Ring-based election |
| cn004 | Raft Election | Raft leader election |
| cn005 | Paxos Proposer | Paxos proposer role |
| cn006 | Paxos Acceptor | Paxos acceptor role |
| cn007 | View Change | View change protocol |
| cn008 | Membership | Group membership |
| cn009 | Lease Manager | Distributed leases |
